page.title: 01MONYASH
page.content: {Monyash}is a quiet,rural village about 7km west of Bakewell.It is at the head of{Lathkill Dale}and is situated 260m above sea level.It is in the{White Peak}area of{Derbyshire. The{population}of Monyash is now 271.(At the beginning of this century it was 384).In recent years quite a few new-comers have moved into the village.A few houses have been sold as {holiday homes. There are several small farms in the area _ mainly{dairy farms}with a few sheep and beef cattle.Monyash used to be an important centre for the{Lead {Mining Industry.}There are still alot of old workings in the area and many uncapped mine shafts. Alot of{visitors}come to Monyash for holidays and weekends.It is in a popular{walking area.
